WEATHER FORECAST FOR 01 August 2023
Issued at 12.00 noon on 31 July 2023
Several spells of showers will occur in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Kandy,
Nuwara-Eliya, Galle and Matara districts.
Mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere over the Island.
Fairly strong winds about 40 kmph can be expected at times in western slopes of the central
hills, Northern, North-Central, Southern and North-Western provinces, and in Trincomalee
district.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
